name: Reveal Fantasia
synopsis: Reveal Fantasia is a RPG that involved an innovative concept of a role playing game involving no battles or fighting. Play as Mariel Woodworth: She lost her mother at an early age, and while her father is a fairy tamer himself, she is being raised by her guardian fairy, Fiona. With a pure, bright and obedient disposition, she is adored by the other villagers of Oakberry.  This adorable 14 year-old girl with the country bumpkin hairstyle is the heroine of this story.
